name: Redoor
description:
Redoor is a simple narrative game designed in Twine2 Engine in 48 hours  [at] Bahçeşehir University Game Design Dartment "BUG Fall Gamejam 2017"

The theme was "I said murder? You said murder!" so I decided to make a narrative game where the killer and the protagonist are kind of the same.

I've used Twine engine for the first time.  Hope you enjoy it and please drop me a line or two about your thoughts.
